com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui
Class CardBoardButton

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui.CardBoardButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class CardBoardButton
extends javax.swing.JComponent

The Button class is used to draw one of the three Cardboard game buttons in the GameWindow. The type of button to be created is defined in the Button constructor using the ButtonType enumeration.

Operations:

  • The Button class can create three types of buttons for the game board.

Version:
1.3, 1/14/09 Version History
Author:
Nikhil Kowshik, Formerly Brad Barrows at version 1.2
See Also:
Serialized Form
Version History:
- 12/04/08 1.2 More Pseudocoding
- 12/02/08 1.1 Added Version History & Pseudocode
